Package it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Network.Messages

Class MessageParserClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Network.Messages.MessageParserClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageVisitorClient
    public class MessageParserClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageVisitorClient
    Visitor pattern For each received message, here are described the actions that the client has to do
    Author:
    Luca Ferrari
